hangle: 리비아 영애보다 나와 노는 게 더 재밌을 거야.
first_translate: I’m sure  I’ll have more fun playing with me than lady livia will.
that’s what I plan on doing.
huh...?
fiona...
siegren.
it looks like this worked better than expected.
this is working out pretty well.

hangle: 내가 너한테 무르다는 걸 알고 얼굴을 너무 남발하는 거 아냐?!
first_translate: didn’t you realize that you’re being too forward because you know how soft-hearted I am toward you?!

hangle: 키스마크 하나에도 얼굴을 붉히던 순진한 녀석은 어디로 간 거야!
first_translate: where did my innocent boy go?! he used to blush at just one kiss mark!
give back my siegren!
nope.

hangle: 난 리비아 영애와 친하게 지낼 거야.
first_translate: I want to get close to lady livia.
too bad for you.
let me see your hand for a second.
why?
wow,
the effect was amazing...
of course it would’ve been.
what are you suddenly so upset about?

hangle: 네가 네 얼굴로 날 홀리려 했던 게 어쩐지 얄미워서.
first_translate: because I don’t appreciate you trying to seduce me using those good looks of yours.
anyway,
don’t worry about lady livia.

hangle: 난 이 세상에서 너를 가장 소중하게 생각하니까.
first_translate: out of everyone in this world, I care most about you.

hangle: …딱히 리비아 영애를 신경 쓰는 건 아니야.
first_translate: it’s not really her that bothers me.
my concern is...

hangle: 영애가 무도회장에서 늘 수많은 영식들에게 둘러싸여 있다는 점이지.
first_translate: ...that she always seems to be surrounded by many young men whenever we attend balls together.
and why does that bother y--
ouch.

hangle: 같이 있으면 너도 관심받을 거 아냐.
first_translate: if you hang around them, they might start paying attention to you as well.
is that jealousy talking?
yep.
try putting yourself in my shoes.
putting myself in your shoes...
two-timing isn’t allowed,
siegren.
right.

hangle: 피오나, 이제 너도 내 심정을 알겠―
first_translate: now do you understand where I’m coming from--?
when your feelings change, you need to end things properly!

hangle: 다른 사람을 만나고 싶으면 이전의 관계는 정리하는 게 예의야.
first_translate: before moving onto another person, it’s only polite to wrap up any previous relationships first.
do you understand now?
I suppose so...

hangle: 전하, 또 호위를 안 데리고 가셨습니까?
first_translate: your highness! you went without bringing guards again, didn’t you?
of course.
with fiona there, having knights nearby would only cause trouble.
you can’t keep acting like this.
at least give us some sort of answer.
if you continue to act this way,

hangle: …저런 까칠한 성격이라면 여자한테도 금방 차일 거야!
first_translate: a girl won’t put up with such a prickly personality either!
eek.
I haven’t gotten dumped yet.
shit.

hangle: 연인이 되면 어느 정도 만족할 수 있을 줄 알았는데.
first_translate: I thought becoming lovers would satisfy me somewhat,
but nope.

hangle: 피오나를 보고 있으면 자꾸만 저열한 생각이 든다.
first_translate: all these base thoughts come into my head when I look at fiona.
while I want to watch her smile all day long,

hangle: 내게 매달려 우는 것도 보고 싶어.
first_translate: I also want to see her cling to me while crying.
when your feelings change, you need to end things properly!

hangle: 다른 사람을 만나고 싶으면 이전의 관계는 정리하는 게 예의야.
first_translate: before moving onto another person, it’s only polite to wrap up any previous relationships first.
I hope she doesn’t dump me.
livia.
an engagement letter arrived.
oh dear, you seem quite displeased.
uh... yes.
apparently his highness sent over a marriage proposal.
that must definitely be the crest of the royal house.
how could he send our household an official marriage proposal after pestering you at social events?

hangle: 공식적으로 가문의 청혼서를 넣는 것의 차이가 얼마나 큰데…
first_translate: there’s a huge difference between those two actions...
he ignored my wishes and still proposed anyway.
father,
please tell me you aren’t going to accept it.
not if you don’t wish for me to, my baby.
but...
I already know.
this is an official proposal from the imperial family.
in order to reject him properly, we need a legitimate reason.
for example...
we’d need to find...
...a new fiancé for me, right?
